summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York attaching a search warrant application for an upcoming search in the US Virgin Islands (USVI). The document is part of the legal preparations in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email who is attaching a search warrant application for review, indicating their role in preparing for an upcoming search operation.

events.title: Email transmitting search warrant application
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email with an attached search warrant application for an upcoming search in the US Virgin Islands.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY
keyFacts: A search warrant application was being prepared for an upcoming search in the US Virgin Islands as of August 10, 2019.
The communication originated from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York.
The document indicates active legal preparations and investigation activities in the Epstein case post-arrest.
